## authorize.scope variable

Shortcut to specify access scopes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scope: (...scopes: string[]) => (target: any, method?: string | undefined, methodDescriptor?: TypedPropertyDescriptor<any> | undefined) => any
```
